H2856.def: = to put a seal on a written document; ► in order to confirm that the document is authentic and to keep unauthorized readers from having access to it; ≈ associated with both authenticity and secrecy

H8660.def: exact meaning unsure: = person in a position of leadership among the Persians; ► used for {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H2446.def: = man; ► father of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}, governor of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, after exile

H6667.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Chenaanah<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנָה>}; ► false prophet; time of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}

H5838.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zadok<SDBH:צָדֹוק>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of king {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}

H2766.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1841.def: = man; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; one of the family heads who accompanied {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} back to {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} after the exile; one of the signatories to the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}

H1599.def: = man; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; signatory to the {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}; after exile

H1263.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zakkai<SDBH:זַבַּי>}; ► Levite; after exile

H4326.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H4590.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1084.def: = man, also known as {L:Bilgah<SDBH:בִּלְגָּה>}; ► {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; signatory to the covenant document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}; after exile

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H3442.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H245.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► father of {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}, Levite, after exile

H1131.def: = man; ► father of {L:Noadiah<SDBH:נֹועַדְיָה>}, Levite, after exile

H6934.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head; returned from {L:Babylonian<SDBH:בָּבֶל>} exile under {L:Zerubbabel<SDBH:זְרֻבָּבֶל>}; supervised those rebuilding the temple; in charge of worship after exile

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H1941.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► husband of sister of {L:Naham<SDBH:נַחַם>}

H7042.def: = man, also known as {L:Kelaiah<SDBH:קֵלָיָה>}; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► Levite who had married a foreign wife during the exile and had to divorce her

H2605.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shashak<SDBH:שָׁשָׁק>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► family head

H4316.def: = man; ◄ descendant of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}

H7340.def: = central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads

H2139.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Reuben<SDBH:רְאוּבֵן>}; ► father of {L:Shammua<SDBH:שַׁמּוּעַ>}, spy

H1941.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► husband of sister of {L:Naham<SDBH:נַחַם>}

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H6551.def: = very small (about 1.25 millimeters long) black, jumping insect that sucks blood in its adult phase, inflicting itching bites as they do so; its hind legs are adapted for jumping; ◄ |iPulex irritans;|i* ► parasitic on man, but with other subspecies that also live on dogs, camels, and other mammals; ≈ regarded as a nuisance, though insignificant

H5867.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of a nation with the same name

H5720.def: = process by which humans are occupied with sensuous pleasure

H2396.def: = man, also known as {L:Jehizkiah<SDBH:יְחִזְקִיָּה>}; ◄ son of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>}; ► father of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H1941.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► husband of sister of {L:Naham<SDBH:נַחַם>}

H2828.def: = man; ► after exile; stood to the left of {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} when he read from the book of the {L:Law<SDBH:תֹּורָה>}

H1209.def: = man; ► family head; signatory to the covenant document of {L:Nehemiah<SDBH:נְחֶמְיָה>}; after exile

H2756.def: = man, also known as {L:Jorah<SDBH:יֹורָה>}; ► family head; after exile

H2387.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H6659.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahitub<SDBH:אֲחִיטוּב>}, descendent of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► father of {L:Ahimaaz<SDBH:אֲחִימַעַץ>}; became high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>} under {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} and {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}; with the {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>} {L:Nathan<SDBH:נָתָן>} anointed Solomon as {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}'s successor; officer in charge of his tribe

H2605.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shashak<SDBH:שָׁשָׁק>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► family head

H6043.def: = man; ► after exile; stood to the right of {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} when he read from the book of the {L:Law<SDBH:תֹּורָה>}

H1954.def: = man, also known as {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his original name was Hoshea, which was later changed by Moses to Joshua; he was Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H2815.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Azrikam<SDBH:עַזְרִיקָם>}; ► father of {L:Shemaiah<SDBH:שְׁמַעְיָה>}, Levite

H3873.def: = man; ► father of {L:Shallum<SDBH:שַׁלּוּם>}, chief of half of district of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>}, who participated in the repair of the city wall

H7348.def: = man, also known as {L:Nehum<SDBH:נְחוּם>}; ► returned from exile with {L:Zerubbabel<SDBH:זְרֻבָּבֶל>}

H2605.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shashak<SDBH:שָׁשָׁק>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► family head

H6052.def: = a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity

H2766.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H1196.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Rimmon<SDBH:רִמֹּון>}; ► murderer of king {L:Ish-Bosheth<SDBH:אִישׁ־בֹּשֶׁת>}

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H7778.def: = a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H5411.def: literally, "the ones given" or "the dedicated ones"; hence = persons who were responsbile for doing regular tasks in the Temple and for serving the priests

H914.def: = action by which part of an entity is separated from the rest, either by detaching it completely it or by creating a kind of barrier (visible or invisible) between the selected part and the rest of the entity

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H995.def: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H117.def: = pertaining to inspiring awe and respect ◄ because of one's beauty, size, strength, or status

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

H7621.def: = action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

H423.def: = action by which the name of a deity is invoked and asked to punish a wrong-doer; ◄ contexts in which this may happen include: (1) covenants and agreements, where the deity is asked to punish those who do not obey the terms of the agreement, (2) cases  where a supposedly wrongful act has been committed, but where there is not enough certainty about the identity of the person who is responsible, and (3) in order to prevent people from committing a wrongful action, knowing that the deity's punishment will be upon them if they do so

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4687.def: = causative action by which humans or deities prescribe or instruct (other) humans or themselves how to behave or respond to a situation

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H2706.def: = specific actions required by somebody in authority

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H113.def: = man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H4728.def: = goods and products that are intended for trade and commerce

H7668.def: = causative action or process by which humans or deities cause an object to be broken into two or more pieces; ≈ sometimes use figuratively to denote the sudden end of a certain condition or situation

H4376.def: = causative action by which humans hand over objects or privileges in their possession in exchange for goods or money

H7676.def: = the seventh day of the week, which is a day of rest during which the people are not to do any work

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H7637.def: = state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

H5203.def: = process by which ropes that used to be tightly strung begin to hang loose

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4855.def: = money or other valuable objects that were borrowed from someone else and will need to be returned

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H4687.def: = causative action by which humans or deities prescribe or instruct (other) humans or themselves how to behave or respond to a situation

H7992.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H8255.def: = weight of approximately 11.5 grams, equals 20 {L:gerahs<SDBH:גֵּרָה>} and 2 {L:bekas<SDBH:בֶּקַע>}; 50 shekels make up 1 {L:mina<SDBH:מָנֶה>}; ► used for payment

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H4635.def: = state in which objects are arranged in a certain order

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H7676.def: = the seventh day of the week, which is a day of rest during which the people are not to do any work

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H3722.def: = causative action by which humans cover objects with a coating of a certain substance

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H4399.def: = an activity involving a physical effort and usually requiring a certain amount of training or skill

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1486.def: = specially marked object, such as a pebble or piece of pottery, ► used in order to decide questions

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H2163.def: = action by which someone makes a decision regarding the time that a certain event is to take place

H6256.def: = a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1197.def: = process by which someone or something is harmed or destroyed by fire

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1061.def: = the earliest agricultural outcomes of the season; ► with an important function in the religious offerings system; ≈ often with a religious connotation

H127.def: = the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

H6529.def: = produce from crop-bearing trees and plants

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1060.def: = first offspring of any female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing

H929.def: often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to {L:humans<SDBH:אָדָם>}, {L:birds<SDBH:עֹוף>}, {L:reptiles<SDBH:רֶמֶשׂ>}, {L:insects<SDBH:שֶׁרֶץ>}, and {L:fish<SDBH:דָּג>}

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7225.def: = point in time at which an event starts happening

H6529.def: = produce from crop-bearing trees and plants

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H8492.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well-being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness{N:001}

H3323.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food and in various religious rituals

H4643.def: = state in which an entity is one out of ten equal parts

H127.def: = the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H214.def: = valuable goods in one's possession; ≈ falsely considered a source of well-being

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3878.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H1715.def: = seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as food

H8492.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well-being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness{N:001}

H3323.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food and in various religious rituals

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H4720.def: = part of an object that is considered more holy than the rest

H7778.def: = a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H5800.def: = action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place
